org.apache.sshd.client.subsystem.sftp.impl

Class SftpOutputStreamAsync

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.apache.sshd.common.util.io.OutputStreamWithChannel
        • org.apache.sshd.client.subsystem.sftp.impl.SftpOutputStreamAsync
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable, Channel

    public class SftpOutputStreamAsync
extends org.apache.sshd.common.util.io.OutputStreamWithChannel
    Implements an output stream for a given remote file
    Author:
    Apache MINA SSHD Project
